apply 1.hcl

# Compare the result of "SHOW TABLE users" with the content of a file named '1.sql'.
cmpshow foo 1.sql

# Files
-- 1.hcl --
schema "$db" {}

table "foo" {
  schema    = schema.$db
  column "precision_default" {
    null      = false
    type      = timestamp
    default   = sql("CURRENT_TIMESTAMP")
  }
  column "timestamp_4" {
    null    = false
    type    = timestamp(4)
    default = sql("CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(4)")
  }
  column "timestamptz_4" {
    null    = false
    type    = timestamp_with_time_zone(4)
    default = sql("CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(4)")
  }
}

-- 1.sql --
                           Table "script_column_time_precision.foo"
      Column       |            Type             | Collation | Nullable |       Default
-------------------+-----------------------------+-----------+----------+----------------------
 precision_default | timestamp without time zone |           | not null | CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
 timestamp_4       | timestamp without time zone |           | not null | CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(4)
 timestamptz_4     | timestamp with time zone    |           | not null | CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(4)
